Project Description
Winform theme,winform styles,custom styles,
custom themes

HeroBeast.WindowsForm realize custom window's non-client area, include title area 、ico area 、 control box and toolstrips styles.

provide editor of the styles,can custom styles save as to *.xml. now only provide three thems.default.xml(office 2007 blue),office 2007 black,vista black themes.

use GDI+ with c# 2.0 realized.
